name: Ariya Chotiwat - When A Star Falls
name_original: Ariya Chotiwat - When A Star Falls
description:
When a Star Falls is about a young star that had fallen down to Earth, getting separated from her lover for decades. She wakes up without any recollection, and decides to venture through to the city for answers. Join her on this journey through terrains and unpleasant areas that could otherwise snuff her out. 

All assets are from the Unity store, or from third party sites such as FreeAssets.com or independent sites. Parallax backgrounds are to their own creators. The player sprite is originally made by me. 

 Wanted to charm the players through expressing different emotions with visuals. I wanted players to look at the background for clues on what to do, not have it be just a background. I also love creating challenges, so there are many “unfair Mario” references near the end.
